## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/UInt8/AdditiveArithmetic-Implementations#topics)

### [Operators](/documentation/Swift/UInt8/AdditiveArithmetic-Implementations#Operators)

[`static func + (Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint8/+(_:))Returns the given number unchanged.[`static func += (inout Self, Self)`](/documentation/swift/uint8/+=(_:_:)-4vs0u)Adds two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.[`static func -= (inout Self, Self)`](/documentation/swift/uint8/-=(_:_:)-45l1)Subtracts the second value from the first and stores the difference in the left-hand-side variable.### [Type Properties](/documentation/Swift/UInt8/AdditiveArithmetic-Implementations#Type-Properties)
